channel.title: Pinecone Data
channel.description: The official blog of Pinecone Data.

item.title: Jump into Data Science with JupyterLab
item.description: Today we’ll be covering how to self-host JupyterLab on a Linux machine for a single user. If you’re not familiar with Project Jupyter, I highly recommend that you check it out, especially if you work in data science or with Python. Project Jupyter is migrating the classic Jupyter Notebooks into... [Read More]

item.title: Outlier or Caitlin Clark? A Data Science Project
item.description: Today we’ll go over how to start a new data science project by acquiring the data (using APIs and a CSV export). This is the first part of a series that will walk through the entire process of a data science project - from initial steps like data acquisition, preprocessing,... [Read More]

item.title: Outlier or Caitlin Clark? A Data Science Project
item.description: Today we’ll walk through how to derive new features from existing columns by calculating additional metrics and extracting textual data.
